title: Happy Birthday, Rinari!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Rinari, happy birthday~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You scared me there. Ai-san, this is a first-year classroom.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, I dashed all the way here when class ended~! I’m glad you didn’t leave yet, Rinari.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, thanks for the birthday wishes. Rina-chan Board says, “Thanks.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s the least I could do as your best friend, Rinari! Alright, come with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Eh? Where are we going?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Rinari, since it’s your birthday today, Ayumu and the others are going to hold a live concert today! Let’s get to the venue!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I get to watch Ayumu-san and the others perform live? I’m so happy that they’re holding a birthday live for me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ayumu said, “If we say our birthday wishes on stage to Rina-chan, then there’s no way she won’t hear them!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>R-Really? Rina-chan Board says, “Excited.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
